name: Big D's Fall Mixtape 2022
description:
Wow! I sure made this. This is a thing I made in order to learn Unity. It is not very good. Basically it is two mini games with a little main menu thing. WOW! It sure has some cozy vibes tho hopefully.

You control the whack-a-mole game with the mouse and the rhythm games with the 1, 2 and 3 keys on your keyboard.

For some reason the text size is different in browser, but it's almost 2am and I'm kinda sick of this, so I'll just leave it. Just know that the game would have been waaaaaaay better if the text size was the same as the way I intended.
